datasetParam.name: sequenceId
datasetParam.help: Enter an identifier for a genomic sequence. The IDs correspond to the accession numbers in the GenBank records supplied by the sequencing centers. Wild cards are permitted in most queries, i.e. use AAEE* to ask for all C.parvum contigs. Genes By Chromosomal Location does not allow wildcards.

Enter an identifier for a genomic sequence. The IDs correspond to the accession numbers in the GenBank records supplied by the sequencing centers. Wild cards are permitted in most queries, i.e. use DS11* to ask for all contigs that have identifiers that begin with DS11.

Enter an identifier for a genomic sequence. The IDs correspond to the accession numbers in the GenBank records supplied by the sequencing centers. Wild cards are permitted in most queries, i.e. use AACB0200* to ask for all contigs/scaffolds that have identifiers that begin with AACB0200.

Enter an identifier for a genomic contig. The IDs correspond to the accession numbers in the GenBank records supplied by the sequencing centers. Contig ID's from C. parvum whole genome sequencing project begin with 'AAEE' and contig ID's for C. hominis begin with 'AAEL'. The C. parvum Chromosome 6 independently sequenced at MRC-LMB before the whole genome project was completed is 'BX526834 '. Wild cards are permitted in most queries, i.e. use AAEE* to ask for all C. parvum contigs.

Sequence IDs for P. falciparum chromosomes are 'Pf3D7_01' through 'Pf3D7_14.' Sequence IDs for P. yoelii sequences begin with 'AABL'. Sequence IDs for P. vivax chromosomes begin with 'CM', while the contigs begin with 'AAK' or 'AY'. Sequence IDs of P. chabaudi chromosomes start with 'chab', while the contigs begin with 'contig'. P.knowlesi chromosome sequences start with 'PK' or 'chr'. P. berghei sequences start with 'PB', P.reichenowi sequence start with 'Pr', while those of P.gallinaceum start with 'Pg'. Wild cards are permitted in most queries, i.e. use 'AABL*' to ask for all P. yoelii sequences. Genes By Chromosomal Location does not allow wildcards.
